title: Strawberry Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 STRAWBERRY NICOTINE POUCHES Strawberry nicotine pouches by 77 offer the divine taste of freshly picked strawberries in a nicotine pouch completely free of tobacco. The strong nicotine content combined with the sweet flavour of strawberries makes this pouch ideal to satiate your cravings for something sweet. View all 77 Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 13MG Per Pouch Strawberry flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT STRAWBERRY-FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES there is no doubt that strawberries are one of the best, if not the best berry. It is at least classified as the most popular berry in the world, and it is the most eaten one too. Strawberries are used in jam, ice cream, baked goods, and nicotine pouches, so it is not just delicious, but versatile. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
